original_title: Celine Dion - A new day has come
overview: New Day Has Come is the title of Canadian singer Celine Dion's 28th album. The album marks Celine's return after a two-year break in her career. It is CÃ©line Dion's first new album out of this 1998 holiday Christmas album These Are Special Times. Among these releases the singer had released only two collections: All the Way ... The Decade of Song and The Collector's Series, Volume One.
title: Celine Dion - A new day has come
